name: .MESH File Extension
summary: Learn about .MESH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 3D model format that stores objects as 3D "mesh" files; creates a digital representation of geometric models by using a collection of polygons to form the surface of each object.

content: MESH files are used by Medit, a French program for visualizing scientific models. The program displays computation results of mechanics related to solids, fluids, thermics, electromagnetism, etc.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
